<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-3.3
<SEQUENCE>5
<FILENAME>ex3_3.htm
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
     <TITLE></TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">

<P STYLE="margin: 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="margin: 0"></P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: right"><B>Exhibit 3.3</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: center"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: center"><B><U>AGREEMENT OF
MERGER AND </U></B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: center"><B><U>PLAN OF MERGER
AND REORGANIZATION</U></B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">This
Agreement of Merger and Plan of Merger and Reorganization (this &ldquo;Agreement&rdquo;) is made as of this 17th day of September
2010, by and between GelStat Corporation (&ldquo;Gel-MN&rdquo;) (a Minnesota corporation) and GelStat Corporation (&ldquo;Gel-DE&rdquo;)
(a Delaware corporation), (together, the &ldquo;Constituent Corporations&rdquo;).</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">WHEREAS,
the respective boards of directors of the Constituent Corporations deem it advisable and have recommended that Gel-MN be merged
with and into Gel-DE under the laws of the state of Minnesota in the manner provided pursuant to the Minnesota statutes and the
Delaware General Corporation Law (&ldquo;DGCL).</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">NOW,
THEREFORE, in consideration of the premises and of the mutual promises herein, the Constituent Corporations do hereby agree, to
merge upon the terms and conditions stated below.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">1.
<U>Agreement to Merger</U>. The Constituent Corporations hereby agree that Gel-MN shall be merged with and into Gel-DE (hereinafter
sometimes referred to as the &ldquo;Surviving Corporation&rdquo;).</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">2.
<U>Name of the Surviving Corporation</U>. The name of the Surviving Corporation shall be GelStat Corporation.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">3.
<U>Ownership Interests</U>. Each ownership interest in the Gel-MN shall be converted into an ownership interest of Gel-DE, such
that, immediately following the conversion, each holder of an ownership interest of Gel-MN shall own the same ownership interest
in Gel-DE that such shareholder owned in Gel-MN immediately prior to the merger.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">4.
<U>Certificate of Incorporation</U>. The Certificate of Incorporation of Gel-DE shall continue to be the certificate of Gel-DE.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">5.
<U>Filing of Articles of Merger</U>. If (a) this Agreement is adopted by the shareholders of Gel-DE, and (b) this Agreement is
not thereafter, and has not theretofore been, terminated or abandoned as permitted by the provisions hereof, then duly authorized
officers of the respective parties shall make and execute Articles of Merger and a Certificate of Merger and shall cause such documents
to be filed with the State of Minnesota and the State of Delaware, respectively, in accordance with the laws of the States of Minnesota
and Delaware. The Merger shall become effective on the date on which the Merger becomes effective under the laws of Minnesota or
the date on which the Merger becomes effective under the laws of Delaware, whichever occurs later, which date is herein referred
to as the &ldquo;Effective Date.&rdquo;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">6.
<U>Certain Effects of Merger</U>. On the Effective Date, the separate existence of Gel-MN shall cease, and Gel-MN shall be merged
into Gel-DE which, as the Surviving Corporation, shall possess all the rights, privileges, powers, and franchises, of a public
as well as of a private nature, and be subject to all the restrictions, disabilities, duties and liabilities of Gel-MN; and all
and singular, the rights, privileges, powers, and franchises of Gel-MN, and all property, real, personal, and mixed, and all debts
due to Gel-MN on whatever account, as well as stock subscriptions, liens and all other things in action or belonging to Gel-MN,
shall be vested in the Surviving Corporation; and all property, rights, privileges, powers, and franchises, and all and every other
interest shall be thereafter as effectually the property of the Surviving Corporation as they were of Gel-MN, and the title to
any real estate vested by deed or otherwise, under the laws of Minnesota or any other jurisdiction, shall not revert or be in any
way impaired; but all rights of creditors and all liens upon any property of Gel-MN shall be preserved, unimpaired, and all debts,
liabilities, and duties of Gel-MN shall thenceforth attach to the Surviving Corporation and may be enforced against it to the same
extent as if said debts, liabilities, and duties had been incurred or contracted by it. At any time, or from time to time, after
the Effective Date, the last acting officers of Gel-MN or the corresponding officers of the Surviving Corporation, may, in the
name of Gel-MN execute and deliver all such proper deeds, assignments, and other instruments and take or cause to be taken all
such further or other action as the Surviving Corporation may deem necessary or desirable in order to vest, perfect, or confirm
in the Surviving Corporation title to and possession of all Gel-MN&rsquo;s property, rights, privileges, powers, franchises, immunities,
and interests and otherwise to carry out the purposes of this Agreement.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">7.
<U>Bylaws</U>. The Bylaws of Gel-DE, as in effect immediately before the Effective Date, shall from and after the Effective Date
be, and continue to be, the Bylaws of the Surviving Corporation until amended as provided therein.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">8.
<U>No Appraisal or Dissenters Rights. </U>In accordance with the provisions of Section 262 of the Delaware General Corporation
Law and Section 302A.471 of the Minnesota Statutes, no holder of shares of Gel-DE or Gel-MN Stock shall have any appraisal or dissenters
rights as a result of the execution and delivery of this Agreement.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><B>IN
WITNESS WHEREOF</B>, this Agreement has been executed by the parties hereto on the date first above written.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0 0 0 3in; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0 0 0 3in; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0 0 0 3.5in; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">GELSTAT
CORPORATION, a Delaware corporation</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0 0 0 3in; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">By:
<U>/s/ Gerald Kieft</U></P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0 0 0 3in; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><U></U>Gerald Kieft, Chief Executive Officer</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0 0 0 3.5in; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">GELSTAT
CORPORATION, a Minnesota corporation</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0 0 0 1in; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0 0 0 3in; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">By:
<U>/s/ Gerald Kieft</U></P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0 0 0 3in; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><U></U>Gerald Kieft, Chief Executive Officer</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; letter-spacing: -0.15pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>



<P STYLE="margin: 0"></P>

<P STYLE="margin: 0; text-align: right"><FONT STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><B>&nbsp;</B></FONT></P>

OF DELAWARE</B></FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 16pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: center"><FONT STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><B>CERTIFICATE
OF MERGER OF</B></FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 16pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: center"><FONT STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><B>FOREIGN
CORPORATION INTO</B></FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 16pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: center"><FONT STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><B>A
DOMESTIC CORPORATION</B></FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 16pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0"><FONT STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><B>&nbsp;</B></FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 16pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">Pursuant
to Title 8, Section 252 of the Delaware General Corporation Law, the undersigned corporation executed the following Certificate
of Merger:</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><B>FIRST</B>:
The name of the surviving corporation is <U>GelStat Corporation</U>, a Delaware corporation, and the name of the corporation being
merged into this surviving corporation is <U>GelStat Corporation, </U>a <U>Minnesota</U> corporation.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><B>SECOND</B>:
The Agreement of Merger has been approved, adopted, certified, executed and acknowledged by each of the constituent corporations
pursuant to Title 8 Section 252 of the General Corporation Law of the State of Delaware.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><B>THIRD</B>:
The name of the surviving corporation is <U>GelStat Corporation</U>, a Delaware corporation.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><B>FOURTH</B>:
The Certificate of Incorporation of the surviving corporation shall be its Certificate of Incorporation. (If amendments are affected
please set forth)</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><B>FIFTH:
</B>The authorized stock and par value of the non-Delaware corporation is <U>50,000</U>,<U>000 shares of common stock, par value
$0.01</U>.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><B>SIXTH:
</B>The merger is to become effective on <U>September 19, 2010 </U></FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><B>SEVENTH</B>:
The Agreement of Merger is on file at <U>3557 SW Corporate Parkway, Palm City, FL 34990</U>, an office of the surviving corporation.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><B>EIGHTH</B>:
A copy of the Agreement of Merger will be furnished by the surviving corporation on request, without cost, to any stockholder
of the constituent corporations.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><B>IN
WITNESS WHEREOF</B>, said surviving corporation has caused this certificate to be signed by an authorized officer, the <U>19<SUP>th
</SUP></U>day of <U>September, </U>A.D., <U>2010</U>.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
